description: Lists the targets (thing groups) associated with a given Device Defender security profile. Requires permission to access the ListTargetsForSecurityProfile action.

nested_items.name: securityProfileTargets
nested_items.description: The thing groups to which the security profile is attached.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the security profile.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that can be used to retrieve the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
